name: Daguri: Gambling Apocalypse
storyline:
'Daguri', the warrior who saved the world from certain destruction. He is a hero who saved the world from doom with many companions by his side. As a reward for his bravery, The Kingdom granted him ₩50 million as a special award.

But perhaps it was too much for him... He decided to go to a casino and ended up spending all his money on gambling — three months later, he lost all of the ₩50 million he used to have, and racked up a debt of ₩30 million.

And now Daguri only has ₩300 thousand in his hands; that will only last him a month...

Pay back what you owe gambling, by gambling more! Make the impossible possible!
summary: Daguri: Gambling Apocalypse is an open world gambling simulator. You must help ‘Daguri’ pay the debts he racked up during an unintended gambling spree. Roam the world, bet on gambling mini-games, and make some money!
